message: Hi Bob, I'm selling this product for $115. It's in great condition and worth every penny. Let me know if you're interested!
Hello Alice, thank you for your offer. I think I can agree to $105 for the product. Let me know if this works for you!
Bob, I appreciate your offer, but I'm still hoping for a bit more.  I'm willing to come down to $110. What do you think?
Hello Alice, I've considered your offer and I'm willing to pay $108 for the product. Let me know if this is acceptable.
